channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat, Inc. -- PackageKit
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat, Inc. -- PackageKit

item.title: CVE-2018-1106|2024-08-05T03:51:48.983Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- packagekit
item.description: An authentication bypass flaw has been found in PackageKit before 1.1.10 that allows users without administrator privileges to install signed packages. A local attacker can use this vulnerability to install vulnerable packages to further compromise a system.
